title: AI Engineer & Android Developer
description: A freelance Android developer with 4+ years of experience in building scalable and high-performance mobile applications. Holds a professional master's degree in AI and Data Science. Consistently delivers high-quality work on time, efficiently managing related tasks. Additionally, knowledgeable in DevOps processes.
My expertise spans across mobile development, data science, machine learning, and DevOps engineering, allowing me to build comprehensive solutions from concept to deployment.
